docs.lead_paragraph: In a weeklong stream of appearances on news programs, Theodore and Andrew Speaker have made effective use of numerous tactics from the plaintiff’s lawyer’s playbook.

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic leaders conceded they were short of the votes needed to override a veto threatened by President Bush.

docs.lead_paragraph: A panel of medical experts said the current system of judging disability claims ignores the impact of injuries on veterans’ quality of life.
